title: As Voting Begins, What Harris And Trump Need To Win The Presidency

title: Trump Or Harris? Who Will Inherit Biden's Mixed Legacy On Key Issues

title: Last Set Of Disengagement Between India, China Ended Oct 21: S Jaishankar

title: Harris Or Trump: US Votes In Extraordinary Presidential Election

title: Iran Calls Woman Who Stripped In Public Is A "Troubled Individual"

title: US Election: When Will We Know Who Is The Next US President?
content: Under the US system, citizens do not vote directly for their leader. Instead, their ballots elect the 538 members of a group called the Electoral College, which then elects the president and vice president.
summary: Under the US system, citizens do not vote directly for their leader. Instead, their ballots elect the 538 members of a group called the Electoral College, which then elects the president and vice president.

title: Iranian Satellites Among Dozens Launched On Board Russia's Soyuz Rocket
content: Russia launched a Soyuz rocket carrying two satellites designed to monitor the space weather around Earth and 53 small satellites, including two Iranian ones, Russia's Roscosmos space agency said.
summary: Russia launched a Soyuz rocket carrying two satellites designed to monitor the space weather around Earth and 53 small satellites, including two Iranian ones, Russia's Roscosmos space agency said.

title: US Elections: How George Washington Became The First President Of America
content: George Washington stood on the balcony of Federal Hall on Wall Street in New York City on April 30, 1789, and took the oath of office, as the first President of the United States.
summary: George Washington stood on the balcony of Federal Hall on Wall Street in New York City on April 30, 1789, and took the oath of office, as the first President of the United States.
